QuestData.Title: Rumbles of Thunder
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bThe foreboding sound of thunder has haunted my people for generations. And as you have discovered in your own research, Lei Shen is at the heart of that fear.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Rumbles of Thunder to Lorewalker Cho.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
